info.name: Audio Player
info.description:
A music player for FLAC, MP3, MP4, AIF, streams, â€¦ with playlist support and SONOS integration.
- Cover & List view for all categories - tuned for big audio collections - Smart lists & standard playlists & local playlists - Stream URLs - Favorites, Sidebar & Search integration - Specifying media folder (with exclude functionality) - One Click Play in Files app - Hardware media keys & Chrome/Android player - [SONOS player](https://github.com/rello/audioplayer_sonos) via add-on - [ID3 editor](https://github.com/rello/audioplayer_editor) via add-on
See [README](https://github.com/rello/audioplayer/blob/master/README.md) file for all supported MIME types and additional information.
